ygData.subject: Re: Financial Aid
ygData.msgSnippet: Will it say it s trivial for that stone? cause i can make malachite rings at like 25 and it doesn t say trivial. The Wanderer ... === The Wanderer May The
ygData.messageBody:
Will it say it's trivial for that stone? cause i can
make malachite rings at like 25 and it doesn't say
trivial.

The Wanderer

--- Tim Borelli <timb@...> wrote:
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> it's easy, the more expensive the stones get, the
> harder they are. work on
> a stone till it becomes trivial to make it with
> silver, then go to the next
> expensive stone. when you get through all the
> stones, start over with
> electrum and the cheapest stones. repeat with gold
> and platinum. enchanted
> metals dont make it any harder.
>
> Qorona of the Volition Guild, 14th lvl enchanter
>
> At 02:38 PM 4/26/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
> >
> >I know about that site. but they dont really talk
> about which skill is
> >required for which stone...above a skill of 8.
> >Skara
